activities.name: Move Files from Landing to Inbox
activities.description: Move Files from Landing to Inbox

source.query:
select distinct(FILE_PATTERN||'_'||needed_dates) as filename from(
select *, to_varchar(date(ucps_clm_part_start_date) + value::int,'YYYYMMDD') as needed_dates from
(
select distinct doc_ctl_nbr,(dateadd(day,-30,ucps_clm_dt)::date) as ucps_clm_part_start_date,
(dateadd(day,70,ucps_clm_dt)::date) as ucps_clm_part_end_date,* FROM SRC_EDI_837.FEKP_TESTBED_DATA),
table(flatten(array_generate_range(0, datediff('day', ucps_clm_part_start_date, ucps_clm_part_end_date) + 1)))
);

select distinct(FILE_PATTERN||'_'||needed_dates) as filename from(
select *, to_varchar(date(ucps_clm_part_start_date) + value::int,'YYYYMMDD') as needed_dates from
(
select distinct doc_ctl_nbr,(dateadd(day,-30,ucps_clm_dt)::date) as ucps_clm_part_start_date,
(dateadd(day,70,ucps_clm_dt)::date) as ucps_clm_part_end_date,* FROM SRC_EDI_837.FEKI_TESTBED_DATA),
table(flatten(array_generate_range(0, datediff('day', ucps_clm_part_start_date, ucps_clm_part_end_date) + 1)))
);

activities.name: Move Files from Landing to Archive
activities.description: Move Files from Landing to Inbox

dependsOn.activity: Move Files from Landing to Inbox
Move Files from Landing to Archive

activities.name: Move Summary File from Op to Arch
activities.description: Move Files from Landing to Inbox

p_folder_name.value:
@concat(pipeline().globalParameters.par_env, '/pre_clm/testbed_archive/', 

concat(formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(utcnow(), 'UTC', 'Central Standard Time'), 'yyyy'),

formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(utcnow(), 'UTC', 'Central Standard Time'),'MM'),

formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(utcnow(), 'UTC', 'Central Standard Time'),'dd')),'/fek/')

source.query: SELECT DISTINCT rtrim(file, '.txt') as file from SRC_EDI_837.TESTBED_FEK_INPUT_CLAIMS_TMP;

activities.name: Move Op Files from Output to Archive
activities.description: Move Files from Landing to Inbox

dependsOn.activity: Move Summary File from Op to Arch

p_folder_name.value:
@concat(pipeline().globalParameters.par_env, '/pre_clm/testbed_archive/',
